participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and supportive, Alex enjoys connecting with others through music.
participant_1.background: I live in Canada. My favourite food is shawarma. I did not graduate high school. My grandfather served in World War A.

participant_2.name: Ben
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and creative, Ben is passionate about music and dreams of making it big.
participant_2.background: My favorite type of music to sing is folk music. I am a musician and hope to make it big someday. I play the piano and guitar and sing. I also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

content.text: Hey, my name is Alex.
Hi Alex, I'm Ben.
What do you do for fun?
I'm a musician, I play the piano and guitar and sing. I also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.
That's cool, I'm a musician too. I play the guitar and sing. I love listening to folk music.
That's great! I love folk music too. I'm actually trying to make it big as a folk musician.
That's awesome! I hope you make it.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
So, what's your favorite song to play?
That's a tough question. I have a lot of favorites. But I think one of my favorite songs to play is "The House of the Rising Sun" by The Animals.
I love that song! It's a classic.
Yeah, it's a great song. I love the way it builds up and then the chorus just hits you.
Me too. It's a really powerful song.
Yeah, it is. I love it.
So, what other instruments do you play?
I also play the piano. I started playing when I was a kid.
Oh, that's cool. I used to play the piano when I was a kid, but I never really got that good at it.
It's never too late to start again.
Yeah, maybe I'll give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will.
Great! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks!
